postData.contentHtml:
The purpose of this text is to help you, the user of Go Bold WatchFace understand the way the product works in regards of your personal data.

Go Bold, is a product that does not process not share any data outside of your own device. The only data that this product is processing is the date time info obtained from the watch that is running the application in order to present in on its screen. No user data is saved during the process.

Contact info: info (at) bit (dot) mk
postData.title: Go Bold - Privacy Policy
